title: Origins
description: Book Two of The Fullerton Chronicles finds us venturing back to the beginning stages of several of David's playmates. Each of them give us more insight into how David has evolved from his simple curious beginnings to a much sought after Dom. Interweaving story arcs trace paths across different starting points in David's timeline. Each moving forward to the present, revealing more layers of who he was, will be, and currently is.
